name: Toxic
description: Monster has augmented Poison powers

name: Chaosweaver
description: Monster is imbued with Chaos Damage and Resistance

name: Frostweaver
description: Monster is imbued with Cold Damage and Resistance

name: Permafrost
description: Monster has augmented Freeze and Chill powers

name: Hasted
description: Monster is faster

name: Deadeye
description: Monster is Accurate and applies Marks

name: Bombardier
description: Monster has augmented Projectile powers and periodically unleashes a barrage of mortars

name: Flameweaver
description: Monster is imbued with Fire Damage and Resistance

name: Incendiary
description: Monster has augmented Ignite powers

name: ArcaneBuffer
description: Monster has augmented Energy Shield powers and releases a stunning nova when Energy Shield breaks

name: Echoist
description: Monster repeats skills additional times

name: Stormweaver
description: Monster is imbued with Lightning Damage and Resistance

name: Dynamo
description: Monster has augmented Shock powers

name: Bonebreaker
description: Monster has augmented Stun powers. Monster hits are slower and can’t be evaded

name: Bloodletter
description: Monster has augmented Bleed powers. Monster Maims nearby enemies\nItems dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

name: Steel-infused
description: Monster is imbued with Physical Damage and Physical Damage Reduction

name: Gargantuan
description: Monster is massive, granting more Life, Area of Effect, and Damage

name: Berserker
description: Monster Enrages as it loses life

name: Sentinel
description: Monster is imbued with Block and Spell Block. Monster Triggers Reckoning when hit

name: Juggernaut
description: Monster cannot be Slowed or Stunned. Monster gains Endurance Charges

name: Vampiric
description: Monster has augmented Life Leech powers

name: Overcharged
description: Monster grants Charges to itself and Allies over time

name: Soul Conduit
description: On death, Monster and nearby Allies are revived

name: Opulent
description: Monster is fabulously wealthy

name: Malediction
description: Monster has a weakening Aura

name: Consecrator
description: Monster periodically creates Consecrated Ground, healing allies and making them immune to curses and ailments

name: Frenzied
description: Monster and allies periodically Enrage

name: Heralding Minions
description: Monster’s minions summon invulnerable Lightning Totems on death

name: Empowering Minions
description: Monster’s minions are empowered. Minions empower the Monster with additional modifiers on death

name: Assassin
description: Monster has augmented Critical powers and has Shroud Walker

name: Trickster
description: Monster has damage avoidance. Monster periodically Flees

name: Necromancer
description: Monster can raise Undead. Minions are empowered and revive shortly after dying\nRewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

name: Rejuvenating
description: Monster has Life Regeneration. Periodically releases a wave that heals nearby allies and prevents enemy Life and Energy Shield recovery\nRewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

name: Executioner
description: Monster gains Damage based on missing enemy Life. Monster has an aura that prevents enemies recovering Life and Energy Shield above 50%

name: Hexer
description: Monster is Hexproof. Monster is followed by a Hexing Effigy that creates Hexing areas

name: Drought Bringer
description: Monster disables Flask effects on hit. Monster has an aura that drains Flask charges and prevents gaining Flask charges

name: Entangler
description: Monster creates Thorned Vines that slow and deal Chaos Damage over time.

name: Temporal Bubble
description: Monster is protected by a Temporal Bubble that severely slows those in it and cannot be damaged by those outside of it

name: Treant Horde
description: Monster’s minions are replaced with powerful Treants. Some Damage taken from the monster is split between the Treants\nMonster’s Minions drop a randomly-chosen Reward Type

name: Frost Strider
description: Monster leaves Chilling Ground in its wake. Minions create Frost Bearers on death

name: Ice Prison
description: Monster periodically entraps players in a cage of ice\nRewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

name: Soul Eater
description: Monster empowers when nearby allies die. Periodically summons Phantasms

name: Flame Strider
description: Monster leaves Burning Ground in its wake. Minions create Flame Bearers on death

name: Corpse Detonator
description: Monster detonates nearby Corpses. Monster periodically creates Corpses

name: Evocationist
description: Monster is imbued with Elemental Damage, Resistances and Ailments

name: Magma Barrier
description: Monster is protected by a Magmatic shield that explodes when depleted. Monster periodically creates Volatile Flamebloods\nRewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

name: Mirror Image
description: Monster can create illusions of itself\nRewards are rolled 2 additional times, choosing the rarest result

name: Storm Strider
description: Monster leaves Shocking Ground in its wake and spawns Lightning Mirages when hit. Minions create Storm Bearers on death

name: Mana Siphoner
description: Monster is surrounded by a ring that deals Lightning Damage over time as well as draining Mana\nRewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

name: Corrupter
description: Monster inflicts Corrupted Blood on Hit and when Hit. Minions create Corrupted Bubbles on death\nItems dropped from the Monster and its Minions are Corrupted

name: Invulnerable
description: Monster and its Minions periodically become immune to all Damage. Minions cannot die while Monster is alive

name: Crystal-skinned
description: Monster triggers the creation of Crystals when hit. Crystals explode when the Monster dies

name: Empowered Elements
description: Monster cycles between imbued damage of a particular type and immunity to all other damage types\nRewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

name: Effigy
description: Monster creates an Effigy of the player. Damage dealt to the Effigy is also reflected to the bonded player\nRewards are rolled 1 additional time, choosing the rarest result

name: Lunaris-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Lunaris\nAll Reward Types have an additional reward

name: Solaris-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Solaris\nAll Reward Types have an additional reward

name: Arakaali-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Arakaali\nAll Reward Types are Divination Cards

name: Brine King-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of the Brine King\nRewards are rolled 6 additional times, choosing the rarest result

name: Tukohama-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Tukohama\nRewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

name: Abberath-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Abberath\nRewards are rolled 4 additional times, choosing the rarest result

name: Shakari-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Shakari\nAll Reward Types are Uniques

name: Innocence-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Innocence\nAll Reward Types are Currency

name: Kitava-touched
description: Monster uses the abilities of Kitava\nRewards are doubled
